oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cossitt - Postcard with message
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cossitt Library; libraries; postcards; 1900s;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Notes on front: Printed: Cossett [sic] Library. Memphis, Tenn. Handwritten: [...]Of what would this remind you. A fine place to talk especially in the museum. No one will disturb you should you feel inclined for a private chat. Have a good time but don't stay too long." Post stamp: Biloxi, February 15, 1907.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Gift of Mrs. Frances W. Manley
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Memphis & Shelby County Room Photograph Collection
